channel.title: me on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in me on Barefoot Rob

item.title: personality
item.description: 01:01 Friday 25 May 2018 JST After the Japanese lesson, I offered to help my teacher with some English questions. She said it was interesting to see how serious I was when teaching English versus how goofy I am while studying Japanese. (goofy is my term; I forgot what she said.)
